title: Auth0 Logs to Azure Log Analytics
name: auth0-logs-to-log-analytics
author: ealsur
description: This extension will take all of your Auth0 logs and export them to Azure Log Analytics

BATCH_SIZE.description: The ammount of logs to be read on each execution. Maximun is 100.

LOGANALYTICS_NAMESPACE.description: Azure Log Analytics Namespace, identifies your application or source.

LOGANALYTICS_APIVERSION.description: Azure Log Analytics API version, defaults to latest.
